title: Sampler, 1806
medium:
Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, chain, satin, knot, double running, buttonhole, herringbone, and four-sided stitches and areas of deflected element work on plain weave foundation
description: Three separate pieces of fabric joined with needlework.  Beads in needle lace at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1806.
1806. Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, chain, satin, knot, double running, buttonhole, herringbone, and four-sided stitches and areas of deflected element work on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-358.
